sub_title: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV
summary:
I am a director, business developer and expert in sustainable transportation and integrated planning with over 20  years of experience. I have successfully delivered various strategic and complex projects, with multi disciplines and diverse working environments in the Netherlands, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Bahrain, Libya and China.
My passion is to explore new business opportunities and markets, develop sound business and action plans, connect with clients and work with them to add value and create sustainable and state of the art solutions. 
Since 2010 I have been focusing on the Middle East market and in particular Saudi Arabia, Bahrain and Oman. I have developed deep understanding of the local market conditions, tendering processes, contracts terms and conditions, technical projects delivery and managed to build a wide network of client contacts enabling me and my teams to grow the business and deliver tailored international best practice solutions locally. 
Since 2015 I have been P&L responsible in various management functions with proven track record in outperforming targets despite challenging market and company conditions. Beside winning work, I managed to enhance team performance and optimize operations and profitability through reorganizations and implementing digital tooling, coaching, and training programs.  
In 2019 I was appointed as director international and since then managed to build up strong team and to grow up solid and profitable business in new markets outside the GCC, such as East Europe and Sub-Sahara Africa. 
I believe in continuous learning and development. I have joined the company leadership program, to contribute to people and company growth, and the digital transformation program to be ready for the future!
Experiences and skills gained from above roles and responsibilities, combined with my strong analytical and commercial skills, technical knowledge, cultural background and my strong communication skills are my most valued assets.
Clients describe me as positive, professional, strategic, persistence, result oriented, communicative, and pleasant to work with even under moments of pressure and conflict. 
Colleagues describes my leadership style as "Ziad gives you opportunities to explore other roles outside your main focus/expertise. He provides guidance in a very neat way, without being very explanatory but also without leaving you helpless in new demanding tasks. He understands when he must act and when he can let loose".

education.degree_name: IPMA Level D Certified Project Management Associate

projects.title: Regional Spatial Studies for Oman
projects.description: Royal HaskoningDHV has been appointed by Oman's Supreme Council for Planning to develop Regional Spatial Strategies for the Dhofar and Al Wusta governorates - two of the Sultanate’s eleven Governorates. This is part of a large project, involving several parties to develop the National Spatial Strategy for Oman. The strategies are to direct and guide spatial planning, promote sustainable development, maximise growth, enable the diversification of economy and creation of employment opportunities.

contributors.headline: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV

projects.title: Architectural Preliminary Design for the Jeddah Public Transport System
projects.description: Working as a part of the Foster + Partners team to “develop the architectural vision” for the public transport system. The plan includes the design of all metro stations and branding.

contributors.headline: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV

projects.title: Engineering Management Consultant for Jeddah
projects.description: A three years contract to provide technical review and management for all Jeddah Municipality Infrastructure related project.  Our team of 57 experts who have been working at the client’s organizations as is responsible for contract management, setting out design guidelines, pre-qualifying consultant and contractors, preparing RfP’s, evaluating bids and providing training to the Municipality staff. Involved driplines are Architect, urban planning, land scape, traffic, highways, utilities, environment, cost and commercial management, program management, training and institutional capacity building.

contributors.headline: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV

projects.title: Arriyadh Traffic Safety Strategy, Riyadh Development Authority
projects.description: Arriyadh Development Authority had recognized the seriousness of road safety problem within the city of Riyadh and the need to develop a comprehensive strategic approach to improve the road safety and reduce the number of accidents. ADA has assigned RHDHV to review the current situation, the performance of the current actions as defined by the previous plan, the role and the performance of the committed stakeholders, to develop new strategic plan for the upcoming five years and to monitor the performance of the stakeholders and to coordinate implementing new safety improvements projects.

contributors.headline: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV

projects.title: Arriyadh Road Network Traffic Management Relieving Measures, Riyadh Development Authority
projects.description:
ADA has assigned RHDHV to undertake a comprehensive analysis of the entire road network of Arriyadh city to define the necessary improvements measure required to increase the efficiency and safety of existing transportation system. This will be achieved by introducing a series of traffic management enhancing measures and through the deployment and utilization of suitable state-of-the-art management related technologies. 
The major task is to identify 30 major critical problems during the 24 months project duration. Each of these problems will be documented with all necessary plans, pictures and videos, results of the analysis, proposed alternate solutions, selected solutions and detailed of the selected solutions including its implementation requirements and impacts

contributors.headline: Director Transport and Environment International at Royal HaskoningDHV
Senior projectleider Mobiliteit bij Provincie Utrecht

profile_positions.description: Since July 2019, my responsibilities have been extended to developing and managing the Transport and Environment International Business. Our major focus is on master planning, economic studies, smart mobility, smart cities, transport and infrastructure planning, non-motorized transport, road safety, TOD and Public Transport.
profile_positions.title: Director Advisory Group Transport and Environment International

profile_positions.description: End responsible for developing and implementing the company strategy for the Transport and Planning business line for the region of Middle East. Our services include strategic and master planning, economic studies and business cases, smart mobility, smart cities, transport and infrastructure planning, cost engineering and risk management, traffic and environmental studies, road safety and flood studies. Our scope of work covers the various stages of projects and includes feasibility studies, planning, concept, preliminary, detailed engineering and procurement.
profile_positions.title: Director Advisory Group Transport and Planning Middle East

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for developing new products and services for the transportation sector, developing business cases and business plans, initiating and maintaining client contacts, creating leads, maintaining client contacts and guaranteeing successful implementation of projects to the client full satisfaction. My focus area is the region of Middle East.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Transport and Planning

profile_positions.description: As a business director transport and infrastructure I am responsible for both commercial and operational management for our team in Saudi Arabia. I will be involved in developing client relations, acquiring projects and ensuring successful implementations of these projects to the client full satisfaction. Also responsible for expanding our local presence and building up strong team morale based on engagement and accountability.
profile_positions.title: Business Director Transport & Infrastructure Saudi Arabia -Bahrain

profile_positions.description: As a business developer I am responsible for initiating and maintaining client contacts and for guaranteeing successful implementation of projects to the client full satisfaction. My focus area is the region of Middle East and in particular Saudi Arabia.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Transport & Planning

profile_positions.description: Development of the business from scratch, initiating client contacts and leads, preparing tenders and winning them. Later on acting as a project manager and client liaison to ensure smooth delivery and continuous business. My focus area is the region of Middle East and in particular Saudi Arabia.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager transportation, infrastructure, urban planning & public transportation

profile_positions.description:
Traffic and Transportation Engineer providing consultancy in the field of traffic modeling, traffic forecast studies, infrastructure planning and project management.
After couple of years a project manager (certified) of multidisciplinary international projects.
profile_positions.title: Consultant and Project Manager Traffic Management
